tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE player_actions (
    player_id INT,
    action VARCHAR(255),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    PRIMARY KEY(player_id, timestamp)
)

CREATE TABLE suspicious_actions (
    action_id INT,
    player_id INT,
    action VARCHAR(255),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    severity INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (action_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES player_actions(player_id)
)

CREATE TABLE cheat_detection (
    detection_id INT,
    player_id INT,
    detection_type VARCHAR(255),
    detection_time TIMESTAMP,
    details JSON,
    PRIMARY KEY (detection_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES player_actions(player_id)
)

CREATE TABLE cheating_players (
    player_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_name VARCHAR(50),
    actions_count INT
)

CREATE TABLE suspicious_actions (
    action_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT REFERENCES cheating_players(player_id),
    action_type VARCHAR(50),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE report_details (
    report_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT REFERENCES cheating_players(player_id),
    reporter_id INT,
    report_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE action_history (
    action_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY REFERENCES suspicious_actions(action_id),
    action_description TEXT,
    is_verified BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE admin_logs (
    log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    admin_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    log_description TEXT
)
